languages.text: Не ведая, якоже выжити им на суровых пустошах Фолстоуна, подступилися люди сии к монастырю святого Когнация, и окружили стены его, и стучали кулаками во врата его, и молили, и возопили: "Возьмите нас, охраните нас". И где прежде был покой и была благодать, сделался гам и беспорядок и омерзело все.

Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.
languages.original_text: Не ведая, якоже выжити им на суровых пустошах Фолстоуна, подступилися люди сии к монастырю святого Когнация, и окружили стены его, и стучали кулаками во врата его, и молили, и возопили: "Возьмите нас, охраните нас". И где прежде был покой и была благодать, сделался гам и беспорядок и омерзело все.

Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

languages.text: Sin saber cómo sobrevivirían a los tristes yermos de Rocainmunda, los fieles abandonados llegaron al monasterio de san Cognatius y rodearon sus muros. Aporrearon con sus puños la puerta, implorando y desgañitándose: «¡Acogednos! ¡Protegednos!». El lugar, otrora un remanso de paz y gracilidad, tornóse un remolino tumultuoso, lleno de desorden y otras aberraciones.
languages.original_text: Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

traits.locale_text: Sin saber cómo sobrevivirían a los tristes yermos de Rocainmunda, los fieles abandonados llegaron al monasterio de san Cognatius y rodearon sus muros. Aporrearon con sus puños la puerta, implorando y desgañitándose: «¡Acogednos! ¡Protegednos!». El lugar, otrora un remanso de paz y gracilidad, tornóse un remolino tumultuoso, lleno de desorden y otras aberraciones.

languages.text: 由于不知道该如何在荒寂岩地险峻的荒原上求生，这群被遗弃的人来到圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的修道院，将修道院团团围住。他们用拳头捶打着大门，恳求着、哀嚎着：“放我们进去吧！帮帮我们！”这座修道院曾是宁静祥和之地，如今却充斥着了喧嚣与混乱，以及各种各样的可鄙之物。
languages.original_text: Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

traits.locale_text: 由于不知道该如何在荒寂岩地险峻的荒原上求生，这群被遗弃的人来到圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的修道院，将修道院团团围住。他们用拳头捶打着大门，恳求着、哀嚎着：“放我们进去吧！帮帮我们！”这座修道院曾是宁静祥和之地，如今却充斥着了喧嚣与混乱，以及各种各样的可鄙之物。

languages.text: ファウルストーンの厳しい荒野で生き抜く術を知らない、見捨てられた宣教師達は、聖人コグナティウスの修道院にやって来て壁を取り囲む。宣教師達は門を拳でたたき「中に入れてください！匿ってください！」と懇願して叫んだ。かつては静かで品のあったその場所は、騒がしくて秩序などなく、ザワザワと嫌な空気が漂った。
languages.original_text: Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

traits.locale_text: ファウルストーンの厳しい荒野で生き抜く術を知らない、見捨てられた宣教師達は、聖人コグナティウスの修道院にやって来て壁を取り囲む。宣教師達は門を拳でたたき「中に入れてください！匿ってください！」と懇願して叫んだ。かつては静かで品のあったその場所は、騒がしくて秩序などなく、ザワザワと嫌な空気が漂った。

languages.text: Ohne zu wissen, wie sie in der lebensfeindlichen Ödnis von Foulstone überleben sollten, erreichten die Zurückgelassenen schließlich das Kloster von St. Cognatius. Sie hämmerten mit ihren Fäusten an das Tor und flehten seine Bewohner an, sie einzulassen und ihnen Schutz zu gewähren. Und was einst als Ort der Stille und Anmut galt, war nun von Getöse, Unordnung und allerlei Abscheulichkeiten geprägt.
languages.original_text: Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

traits.locale_text: Ohne zu wissen, wie sie in der lebensfeindlichen Ödnis von Foulstone überleben sollten, erreichten die Zurückgelassenen schließlich das Kloster von St. Cognatius. Sie hämmerten mit ihren Fäusten an das Tor und flehten seine Bewohner an, sie einzulassen und ihnen Schutz zu gewähren. Und was einst als Ort der Stille und Anmut galt, war nun von Getöse, Unordnung und allerlei Abscheulichkeiten geprägt.

languages.text: Ne sachant pas comment survivre sur les terres désolées de Rochepeste, ces gens abandonnés se sont rendus au monastère de Saint Cognatius et se pressent désormais le long de ses murs. L'on martèle les portes, l'on gémit et l'on implore : « Laissez-nous entrer ! Protégez-nous ! » Et ce qui était normalement un lieu de grâce et de sérénité résonne du désordre, du vacarme et d'une pléthore de manifestations méprisables.
languages.original_text: Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

traits.locale_text: Ne sachant pas comment survivre sur les terres désolées de Rochepeste, ces gens abandonnés se sont rendus au monastère de Saint Cognatius et se pressent désormais le long de ses murs. L'on martèle les portes, l'on gémit et l'on implore : « Laissez-nous entrer ! Protégez-nous ! » Et ce qui était normalement un lieu de grâce et de sérénité résonne du désordre, du vacarme et d'une pléthore de manifestations méprisables.

languages.text: Menfurtaş'ın acımasız çoraklarında nasıl hayatta kalacağını bilemeyen bu terk edilmiş insanlar, Aziz Cognatius manastırına gelip duvarlarının etrafını sardı. Yumruklarını kapıya vurarak feryatlar içinde yalvardılar: "Bizi içeri alın! Bizi koruyun!" Bir zamanlar huzuruyla ve nezaketiyle bilinen bu yer, bu sebeple velvele, düzensizlik ve sayısız kötücül şeyle dolu bir yere dönüştü.
languages.original_text: Not knowing how they would survive in Foulstone's grim wastelands, the forsaken people came to the monastery of Saint Cognatius, and there they surrounded its walls. They hammered their fists on its gate, and implored, and wailed, "Take us in! Protect us!" And what once was a place of serenity and grace was now full of din, disorder, and all manner of things despicable.

traits.locale_text: Menfurtaş'ın acımasız çoraklarında nasıl hayatta kalacağını bilemeyen bu terk edilmiş insanlar, Aziz Cognatius manastırına gelip duvarlarının etrafını sardı. Yumruklarını kapıya vurarak feryatlar içinde yalvardılar: "Bizi içeri alın! Bizi koruyun!" Bir zamanlar huzuruyla ve nezaketiyle bilinen bu yer, bu sebeple velvele, düzensizlik ve sayısız kötücül şeyle dolu bir yere dönüştü.
